title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-2.14 - Emergency brakes and anti-rollback devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-2.14 - Emergency brakes and anti-rollback devices

State Regulations

If cars or other components of an amusement device may
collide in such a way as to cause personal injuries upon failure of normal
controls, emergency brakes sufficient to prevent such collisions shall be
provided. On amusement devices which make use of inclined tracks, automatic
anti-rollback devices shall be installed to prevent backward movement of the
passenger-carrying units in case of failure of the propelling
mechanism. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-2.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
